clauses.title: Your account can be deleted without prior notice and without a reason
clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.
clauses.clause_text: In addition to the Fair Play and Community Guidelines, we reserve the right to exclude people from using our services at our sole discretion, and to determine what constitutes abuse of our services, insofar as the relevant licenses and statute allow for.

case.text: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text:
When you connect to the lichess.org site, a certain amount of data is automatically collected by the site host concerning your terminal (such as a computer, smartphone or tablet) and your browser.
This particularly includes your IP address.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: Your continued use of our website or services after the effective date of any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the changes.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period
clauses.description: The data retention period states how long a service keeps user data. In this case, the service may anonymize the personal data after its retention period is over and use it for analytical or research purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
Please note, however, that LICHESS is entitled to oppose the deletion of certain data, when their retention is necessary for particularly important reasons, such as the protection and defence of its interests in court.

In addition, we may choose, instead of deleting the data, to proceed with their complete and irreversible anonymization. In this way, we will be entitled to keep this data in a format that no longer allows you to be identified (for example: for statistical purposes).

case.text: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of your data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

clauses.title: Your use is throttled
clauses.description: The service may impose limits or restrictions to the use of the service, thus negatively impacting users experience. They may do so without reason or prior notice.
clauses.clause_text: All use of our services are subject to reasonable caps, limits, restrictions, or other bottle-necking which are purely determined at Lichess’ discretion.

case.text: Your use is throttled

clauses.title: Usernames can be rejected or changed for any reason
clauses.description: The service's terms explain they may change or remove usernames at their sole discretion, and they may do so without prior notice.
clauses.clause_text:
On 2024-07-04 08:41:35 UTC, vexer85285 (35608)  wrote:
          When I originally commented I clicked the -Notify me when new surveys are added- checkbox and after this each time a comment is added I get four emails concentrating on the same comment. Is there in any manner you are able to eliminate me from that service? Thanks! https://bxhnhacai.info/

case.text: Usernames can be rejected or changed for any reason

clauses.title: You are not being tracked
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: Most websites (but not Lichess) are infested with ads and trackers.

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text:
Right to erasure

You can ask us to delete all or part of the data we have about you

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
Right to rectification

You can ask us to correct, complete or update the data we have about you, if it seems to you to be inaccurate, incomplete or obsolete.

In this case, we thank you for kindly communicating to us spontaneously, as far as possible, the new information necessary to proceed to the correction, completion or update requested.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.
clauses.clause_text: Summary table

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
clauses.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.
clauses.clause_text: You further agree that if, at our sole discretion, we determine your content to have breached these Terms you may have your content partially or fully removed, hidden, deleted or otherwise made inaccessible, either to yourself and/or others.

case.text: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text:
Today, Lichess users play more than five million games every day.
Lichess is one of the most popular chess websites in the world while remaining 100% free.
Most “free” websites subsist by selling ads or selling user data.
Others do it by putting all the good stuff behind paywalls.
Lichess does none of these things and never will

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: This further processing is compatible with the initial collection of your username, justified by the execution of the contract in accordance with Article 6.1.b of the GDPR as indicated in point 2 above, in accordance with recital 50 and Articles 5 and 89 of the GDPR.

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: Only temporary session cookies are used
clauses.description: Temporary session cookies are cookies that are deleted when you close your browser instead of remaining there until they are manually deleted (or expire). These cookies are only used for the purposes of the service and therefore disappear when it's no longer used.
clauses.clause_text: Session cookies: LICHESS also uses session cookies. These cookies temporarily store the information you have given us and thus allow us to track your movements from one page to another without asking you again for this information to authenticate you.

case.text: Only temporary session cookies are used

clauses.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.

case.text: Pseudonyms are allowed

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last Modified: Thursday 10th March 2022.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last updated: March 07, 2021

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.
clauses.clause_text:
>You must not attempt to gain unlawful access to the website, any server connected to our website, any database or computer connected to our website;
  • You must not attack our website via any kind of volumetric attack, or attempt to exploit any bugs, weaknesses and vulnerabilities present in our website.

case.text: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: Our services are provided “as is” and may require your own efforts, modification, and resources to ensure they work satisfactorily.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
clauses.description: The content you have published on the service may be removed if it infringes copyright.
clauses.clause_text: This also includes content which may constitute copyright infringement, trademark violations or other intellectual property misappropriation, or other unlawful conduct.

case.text: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

clauses.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
clauses.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.
clauses.clause_text:
We cannot guarantee the full or partial function or full or partial accuracy of any of our services.
Consequently, we cannot be held liable for any of your damage or losses sustained, of any type

case.text: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
